skill.description: Research ideation partner. Generate hypotheses, explore interdisciplinary connections, challenge assumptions, develop methodologies, identify research gaps, for creative scientific problem-solving.

skill.author: K-Dense-AI

security_audit.summary: AI analysis failed - manual review recommended

content.value_statement: An AI skill for Claude, Codex, and Claude Code
actual_capabilities: Generate research hypotheses based on existing literature and data
Explore interdisciplinary connections between scientific fields
Challenge assumptions and identify potential flaws in reasoning
Develop experimental methodologies and research designs
Identify gaps in current research and suggest new directions
limitations: Cannot replace expert domain knowledge or peer review
Generated hypotheses require validation by domain experts
May not be aware of very recent unpublished research

use_cases.title: Research Hypothesis Generation
use_cases.description: Generate novel research hypotheses by combining insights from multiple scientific domains

use_cases.title: Literature Gap Analysis
use_cases.description: Identify unexplored areas and potential research opportunities in a field

prompt_templates.title: Generate Hypotheses
prompt_templates.prompt: Based on [research topic], generate 5 novel hypotheses that could advance our understanding of [specific phenomenon]

prompt_templates.title: Find Interdisciplinary Connections
prompt_templates.prompt: Identify potential connections between [field A] and [field B] that could lead to innovative research approaches

output_examples.input: Generate hypotheses about the relationship between gut microbiome and mental health
output_examples.output:
1. Specific gut bacterial strains produce neurotransmitter precursors that cross the blood-brain barrier
2. Microbiome diversity correlates with stress resilience through immune system modulation
3. Early-life microbiome composition influences adult neural plasticity

best_practices: Provide specific context about your research domain for more relevant suggestions
Use iterative refinement to narrow down promising hypotheses
Combine AI suggestions with domain expertise for validation
anti_patterns: Relying solely on AI-generated hypotheses without expert review
Using overly broad prompts without specific research context
Ignoring limitations of AI knowledge cutoff dates

faq.question: Can this skill replace a research advisor?
faq.answer: No, this skill is designed to augment human creativity and expertise, not replace expert guidance. All generated ideas should be reviewed by domain experts.

faq.question: How current is the scientific knowledge?
faq.answer: The skill's knowledge is based on the training data cutoff. For cutting-edge research, always verify suggestions against recent publications.
